name: A. Homework
statement:
Once when Gerald studied in the first year at school, his teacher gave
the class the following homework. She offered the students a string
consisting of small Latin letters; the task was to learn the way the
letters that the string contains are written. However, as Gerald is too
lazy, he has no desire whatsoever to learn those letters. That’s why he
decided to lose some part of the string (not necessarily a connected
part). The lost part can consist of any number of segments of any
length, at any distance from each other. However, Gerald knows that if
he loses more than characters, it will be very suspicious. Find the
least number of distinct characters that can remain in the string after
no more than characters are deleted. You also have to find any possible
way to delete the characters.
